remarks: The predicate "is a linear operator."  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnoval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
lnoval.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
lnoval.3 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
lnoval.4 $e |- H = ( +v ` W ) $.
lnoval.5 $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
lnoval.6 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
lnoval.7 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
islno $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> ( T e. L <-> ( T : X --> Y /\ A. x e. CC A. y e. X A. z e. X ( T ` ( ( x R y ) G z ) ) = ( ( x S ( T ` y ) ) H ( T ` z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d T x y z $.
$d U x y z $.
$d W x y z $.
$d X y z $.
